argument.name: name
argument.description: The registry entry name and full path.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The value to write into the Registry.

page.description: Set an existing system setting (requires full registry path).
page.discussion: The REGISTRY.SYS_SET() method modifies the value of an existing Registry entry. This method will modify any registry entry, and is not limited to the Alpha Anywhere section, as is REGISTRY.SAVE_SETTINGS(). The power of this function makes it dangerous to use. Make sure that you back up your Registry before making any changes.
